name: iced coffee concentrate - ethiopia deri kochowa
description:
This is a light roast Iced Coffee, perfect for this hot Southern California days. This has a nice light body and is filled with light fruity citrus flavors with hints herbal tea flavors. This is perfect to new coffee drinkers, it offers you simplicity to brew and a milder taste that often surprises non-coffee drinkers. Makes up to 18 cups after dilution. Lasts up to 5 weeks in your fridge. Try the coffee beans too!

Get one bottle free with the purchase of 5.
